name: VoxSpace-Endless shoot'em up
description:
VoxSpace is an endlees shoot'em up where difficulty is based on score.

You'll face a good variety of enemies that want to keep you from getting that sweet first place in the leaderboard.

Enemies are spawned based on difficulty and with a bit of randomness so you'll never play the same level twice.

Show your skills and get to the top of the leaderboard!

*This game was meant to be played on Android, I'm sorry if the PC version is bad. I'll try to remake all the UI again if people want it.

*Sadly Leaderboard doesn't work on WebGL version.It should work on Android and PC.

This is the first project i managed to complete since i started developing videogames.

Special thanks to maxparata (https://maxparata.itch.io/) since his assets are the main reason I started this game.Also I'm now learning voxel art for my next projects :).

English isn't my first language so I'm sorry if i got something wrong.

Hope you like it. Comments are very appreciated.
